title: Feathers of Fire
description: There's a reason why things are the way they are. There's a reason why my father died, There's a reason why I'm an outcast, and There's a reason why I moved to Maine. There's always a reason for everything. It's because of those reasons, that I meet Creed. My name is Emmaline Davis. I have half of a parent, a brother who may or may not be a part of my life, and oh! I'm a phoenix! For those, who aren't afraid. You're bluffing. Everyone is afraid at some point, because everyone becomes afraid of things they don't understand.I have a problem. They're coming for me. Who? Well, you'll have to find out by reading my story. I need to protect my family from "Them". I need to also protect my love, Creed. I just need to use...my Feathers of Fire.
author: Christine Woo
